CNAqc 0.1.0

CNAqc

CNAqc is a package that contains different methods to inspect the quality, visualise and process absolute Copy Number Alteration (CNA) calls generated from bulk seqquencing of tumour samples.

Methods are available to integrate somatic mutation data of the same tumour with copy number segments, tumour purity and ploidy. The package provides methods to estimate Cancer Cell Franctions (CCFs) normalizing tumour mutation data for copy number states and tumour purity. The package contains also statistical tests to identify patterns of overfragmentation either in individual chromosome arms or at the whole-genome level.

CNAqc is part of the evoverse set of R packages to implement Cancer Evolution analyses.

Help and support

Installation

You can install the released version of CNAqc from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("caravagn/CNAqc")

Copyright and contacts
